item.title: Live Audience Q&A at Worldview Leadership Academy [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
In this episode, faculty answer questions from students at the Worldview Leadership Academy. We deal with the charge of Christianity’s closed-mindedness, idolatry, apologetics and evangelism, lying to the Nazis, whether you can lose your salvation, and more. Audio quality improves around the 15-minute mark!

Get Joe Boot’s classic work of apologetics, A Time to Search, on sale all month at Ezra Press.

item.title: Christian Combat w/Michael Thiessen [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
Michael Thiessen of Liberty Coalition Canada joins us to discuss the latest developments in the ongoing saga of the church’s relationship to LGBT issues, and the further complication of what happens when the state gets involved. We deal with the proper use of legal process as Christians, news stories, citizenship, charity law, and the prophetic calling of the church.

We rely on your support to continue with all of our work. Would you donate to the Ezra Institute?
